roleset.name: grumble, to make grumbling sounds, utterances
roleset.note: GRUMBLE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'grumble' based on sentences in financial subcorpusand automatic expansion via verbnet. (from grumble.01-v predicate notes)
GRUMBLE-N NOTES: Roleset based on instances in BOLT P01. Comparison to verb entry grumble.01, which maps to VN 37.3, 37.8. No FN entry for the noun. (from grumble.01-n)

example.name: no hearer
example.text: Similarly, Honda Motor Co.'s sales are so brisk that workers grumble they haven't had a Saturday off in years, despite the government's encouragement of more leisure activity.
example.arg: they haven't had a Saturday off in years, despite the government's encouragement of more leisure activity

example.name: complaint as nominal
example.text: [Several Big Board firms]-1 are organizing *trace*-1 to grumble about program trading and the exchange's role in it.
example.arg: about program trading and the exchange 's role in it

example.name: All args
example.text: She walked over to the bench, ignoring his grumble to himself that there definitely would be a 'later'.
example.arg: that there definitely would be a 'later'.
